question: Please provide the Duâ€™aas that will ensure that my family AND the rest of my progeny (Nasl) until Qiyamat will live and die on Imaan and be provided True Guidance by Allah S.W.T.
answer:
QUESTION
If you have any Du?aas taken from any Hadiths, kindly provide that source as well. Also, provide the translation of the Du?aas. Jazak-Allahu Khairan.
ANSWER


Share:
You and your family should recite the following du?aas in the morning and the evening:%0D%0A%0D%0AAllahumma inni asalooka bi ?izzatika ya ?azeezu wa bi qudratika ya qadeeru wa bi hamdika ya hamidu wa bi hikmatika ya hakeemu wa bi rahmatika ya raheemu wa bi ?azmatika ya ?azeemu wa bi ?afwika ya ?afuwwu wa bi fadhlika ya rahmaanu wa bi mannika ya mannaanu an tahfaza ?alayyal imaana fi aanaail laili wa atraafin nahaari qaaiman wa qaa?idan raaki?an wa saajidan yaqdhaanan wa naaiman hayyan wa mayyitan wa ?alaa kulli haalin ya arhamar rahimeen%0D%0A%0D%0ATranslation: ?O Allah, I ask you through your honour O Noble One and through your power O Most Powerful and through your praises O Most Praiseworthy and through your wisdom O the most Wise and through your mercy O most Merciful and through your greatness O Great One and through your forgiveness O most Forgiving and through your grace O most Gracious and through your bestowal O Benefactor that You keep me on Imaan during the day and the night, while standing, sitting, in Ruku, Sajdah and while awake and asleep, while alive and dead and during every other condition O most Merciful of the merciful ones.? (Fataawaa Rahimiyyah, Vol. 7, Page 108)%0D%0A%0D%0AYa muqallibal quloob thabbit qalbi ?ala deenik%0D%0A%0D%0ATranslation: ?O Controller of the hearts let my heart hold fast onto your religion.? (Al-Hisnul Haseen, Page 288)%0D%0A%0D%0AAllahumma inni asalooka imaanan la yartaddu wa naaiman la yanfadu wa muraafaqata nabiyyina sallalaahu alaihi wa sallam fi a?laa darajatil jannati jannatil Khuld.%0D%0A%0D%0ATranslation: ?O Allah, I beg you faith which does not waiver, a grace which does not end and company of our Nabi e in high stations in everlasting Paradise.? (Al-Hisnul Haseen, Page 288)%0D%0A%0D%0AAllahumma naqqini hujjatal imaan ?indal mamaat?%0D%0A%0D%0ATranslation: ?O Allah, let me be reminded to die upon Imaan.?%0D%0A%0D%0A(Al-Hisnul Haseen, Page 302)%0D%0A%0D%0AAnd Allah Ta?ala knows best,%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Muhammad Ashraf%0D%0ADarul Iftaa - Jameah Mahmoodiyah, Springs%0D%0A%0D%0AJOINT PROJECT WITH DARUL IFTA, MADRASAH IN?AAMIYYAH, CAMPERDOWN
